      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Car CarRentalCompany.getCar(Person person)
      Given a person, this method returns the car they are currently renting (if any).
      static DrivingLicence DrivingLicence.getInstance(Person driver, java.util.Date issueDate, boolean isFullLicence)
      getInstance function with a person, and automatically generate the driver licence number that aligns to the rules.
      boolean CarRentalCompany.issueCar(Person person, DrivingLicence drivingLicence, TypeOfCar type)
      This Given a Person (the renter), the person's DrivingLicence and a specification of the type of car required (small or large), this method determines whether the person is eligible to rent a car of the specified type and, if there is a car available, issues a car of the specified type.
      int CarRentalCompany.terminateRental(Person person)
      This method terminates the given person's rental contract.
